medicines.alt: A bottle of pain relief medicine
medicines.title: Pain Relief Medicine
medicines.description: Effective pain relief for headaches, muscle aches, and more.
medicines.usage: Take one tablet every 4-6 hours as needed.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause drowsiness, dizziness, or upset stomach.

medicines.alt: A box of allergy relief tablets
medicines.title: Allergy Relief Tablets
medicines.description: Provides fast relief from allergy symptoms such as sneezing and runny nose.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause dry mouth or drowsiness.

medicines.title: Cough Syrup
medicines.description: Soothes throat and relieves cough.

medicines.alt: A pack of vitamin C tablets
medicines.title: Vitamin C Tablets
medicines.description: Boosts immune system and overall health.

medicines.title: Antiseptic Cream
medicines.description: Prevents infection in minor cuts and scrapes.
medicines.usage: Apply to affected area 1-3 times daily.

medicines.title: Antacid Tablets
medicines.description: Relieves heartburn and acid indigestion.

medicines.alt: A box of cold relief capsules
medicines.title: Cold Relief Capsules
medicines.description: Relieves symptoms of the common cold.

medicines.title: Nasal Spray
medicines.description: Clears nasal congestion and sinus pressure.
medicines.usage: Use 2-3 sprays in each nostril as needed.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause temporary burning or stinging.

medicines.title: Eye Drops
medicines.description: Relieves dry and irritated eyes.
medicines.usage: Instill 1-2 drops in each eye as needed.

medicines.alt: A box of sleep aid tablets
medicines.title: Sleep Aid Tablets
medicines.description: Helps you fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer.
medicines.usage: Take one tablet 30 minutes before bedtime.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause drowsiness the next day.

medicines.alt: A bottle of digestive enzyme capsules
medicines.title: Digestive Enzyme Capsules
medicines.description: Supports healthy digestion and nutrient absorption.
medicines.usage: Take one capsule with each meal.

medicines.title: Probiotic Supplements
medicines.description: Promotes a healthy gut flora and digestive health.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause bloating or gas initially.

medicines.title: Anti-Itch Cream
medicines.description: Relieves itching and skin irritation.
medicines.usage: Apply to affected area 1-3 times daily.

medicines.title: Multivitamins
medicines.description: Provides essential vitamins and minerals for overall health.

medicines.alt: A bottle of fish oil supplements
medicines.title: Fish Oil Supplements
medicines.description: Supports heart health and brain function.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause fishy aftertaste or burps.

medicines.title: Calcium Supplements
medicines.description: Supports bone health and prevents osteoporosis.

medicines.title: Iron Supplements
medicines.description: Prevents and treats iron deficiency anemia.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause constipation or dark stools.

medicines.alt: A bottle of vitamin D supplements
medicines.title: Vitamin D Supplements
medicines.description: Supports bone health and immune function.

medicines.title: Zinc Supplements
medicines.description: Supports immune function and wound healing.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause nausea if taken on an empty stomach.

medicines.title: Magnesium Supplements
medicines.description: Supports muscle and nerve function.
medicines.sideEffects: May cause diarrhea if taken in large amounts.
